title: About
text: This is the About page for my GitHub Pages site.

title: Assignment 01
text:
下面这个 Python 代码单元会在渲染时运行，输出当前 EC2 环境的系统信息（作为运行证明）：
import platform import psutil
print(“Operating System:”, platform.system(), platform.release()) print(“Python Version:”, platform.python_version()) print(“Machine:”, platform.machine()) print(“Processor:”, platform.processor())
mem = psutil.virtual_memory() print(“Total Memory (MB):”, round(mem.total / (10242), 2)) print(“Available Memory (MB):”, round(mem.available / (10242), 2))

title: Assignment 01
text:
title: “About”
This is my personal GitHub Pages site, rendered and published using Quarto directly from an AWS EC2 instance.
